title: Chinese Premier in Surprise Visit to Samsung Chip Plant
text:
Chinese Premier Li Keqiang paid a surprise visit to a Samsung microchip plant in Xian, Shanxi Province on Monday.

According to Chinese state media, Li said, "The Chinese market is vast and its industries are evolving into high value-added sectors resulting in huge business opportunities."

Li added that China's market will open further and welcomed "continuous investment by global high-tech companies like Samsung."

The visit was part of the premier's tour of businesses in Shanxi Province and Samsung was only told a day in advance.
description: Chinese Premier in Surprise Visit to Samsung Chip Plant
